summary: *Big Brother* is a popular reality TV show in the U.S. It's based on a Dutch show and inspired by George Orwell's novel *Nineteen Eighty-Four*. Contestants, called "HouseGuests," live together in a house isolated from the outside world. They're monitored by cameras and microphones, and compete for a cash prize of up to $750,000. HouseGuests get voted out until there's a winner. The show has had many seasons and even spin-offs, making it one of the longest-running reality competition series.
title: Big Brother (American TV series)
